Game

Class SuddenImpact

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Game.SuddenImpact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class SuddenImpact
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener
    main class that starts the game by creating a thread of main implemented with WindowListener components for synchronization with erlang node.
